Package eu.stratosphere.nephele.io

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChannelSelector<T extends Record>
    Objects implementing this interface are passed to an OutputGate.
    Gate<T extends Record>  
    InputGate<T extends Record>
    In Nephele input gates are a specialization of general gates and connect input channels and record readers.
    MutableReader<T extends Record>  
    OutputGate<T extends Record>
    In Nephele output gates are a specialization of general gates and connect record writers and output channels.
    Reader<T extends Record>
    A reader interface which is implemented by record reader.
    RecordAvailabilityListener<T extends Record>
    This interface can be implemented by a class which shall be notified by an input gate when one of the its connected input channels has at least one record available for reading.
    RecordFactory<T>
    This interface defines a factory which is able to instantiate new record objects of the type T.
    Writer<T extends Record>
    A writer interface which is implemented by record writer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractID
    ID is an abstract base class for providing statistically unique identification numbers in Nephele.
    AbstractIDTest
    This class contains tests for the AbstractID class.
    AbstractRecordReader<T extends Record>
    This is an abstract base class for a record reader, either dealing with mutable or immutable records.
    AbstractRecordWriter<T extends Record>
    Abstract base class for a regular record writer and broadcast record writer.
    BroadcastRecordWriter<T extends Record>
    A record writer connects the application to an output gate.
    DataOutputBuffer
    A reusable DataOutput implementation that writes to an in-memory buffer.
    DefaultChannelSelector<T extends Record>
    This is the default implementation of the ChannelSelector interface.
    DefaultChannelSelectorTest
    This class checks the functionality of the DefaultChannelSelector class.
    DefaultRecordFactory<T>  
    GateID
    A class for statistically unique gate IDs.
    MutableRecordReader<T extends Record>  
    MutableUnionRecordReader<T extends Record>  
    RecordReader<T extends Record>
    A record writer connects an input gate to an application.
    RecordWriter<T extends Record>
    A record writer connects the application to an output gate.
    UnionRecordReader<T extends Record>  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DistributionPattern
    A distribution pattern determines which subtasks of a producing Nephele task a wired to which subtasks of a consuming subtask.
